page.title: 01BROWNIES AND SCOUTS
page.content: {BROWNIES There are two Brownie companies in Wylam. The 1st pack is run by Mrs Alison Malcolm and it is held on Tuesday from 6p.m. to 7.15p.m. The 2nd pack is run by Mrs Barbara Burnish and it is held on a Monday from 4 p.m. The leaving age for the brownies is 10 years old and they start brownies at the age of 7. The activities they do include playing games, trips out and making things. {SCOUTS} The scouts meet every Friday at 7p.m. until 9p.m. in the Wylam church hall. There are three leaders Mr Phillips{ ,Mr Wiseman ,Mrs Turnbull and about twenty scouts who are divided into four patrols wolves, eagles, panthers and kestrels.
